Package com.usc.bill.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BillService
    A common interface to handle a general business operations that concerns generating charges and applying payment for student
    StudentManagementService
    A common interface that handle business operations that concerns student profile and courses-related data within the scope of the current requirement
    UserManagmentService
    A common interface to handle business operations that concerns user-related data
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BillServiceImpl
    A common interface to handle business operations that concerns generating charges and applying payment for student within the scope of the current requirement
    StudentManagementServiceImpl
    StudentManagementServiceImpl.java Purpose: an implementation that handles business operations that concerns student profile and courses-related data within the scope of the current requirement
    UserManagmentSerivceImpl
    To handle business operations that concerns generating charges and applying payment for student
